name: get-spo-invalid-user-accounts
title: Get Site Collection invalid user accounts
shortDescription: Find the user accounts which no longer is valid, export report to CSV
longDescription: Identify SharePoint site users that are disabled in Entra ID or missing from the User Profile Application and export the list to CSV.

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample Get Site Collection invalid user accounts
